alert.note: Alert for Eastern Norton Sound and Nulato Hills; Southern Seward Peninsula Coast; St Lawrence Island and Bering Strait Coast; Yukon Delta (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 28 at 4:13PM AKDT by NWS Fairbanks
info.description: ...Elevated Surf Tuesday and Wednesday Along The West Coast From the Bering Strait To The Yukon Delta... A strong storm developing in Eastern Russia on Monday will move along the West Coast of Alaska on Tuesday, and into the Interior by Wednesday. This will bring south winds of 25 to 40 mph to the West Coast on Tuesday that will decrease slowly Tue night and Wed. This will cause elevated surf from the Bering Strait to the Yukon Delta Tuesday into Wednesday, with high surf possible along south facing shores such as at Nome and Golovin. Storm surges of 3 feet above normal high tides are possible Tuesday into Wednesday.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Norton Sound and Nulato Hills; Southern Seward Peninsula Coast; St Lawrence Island and Bering Strait Coast; Yukon Delta
